abstract: Diego Roberto Godín Leal (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈdjeɣo ɣoˈðin]; born 16 February 1986) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays for Atlético Madrid in La Liga, as a central defender.He has spent most of his professional career in Spain, representing Villarreal and Atlético Madrid and winning four major titles with the latter.A Uruguayan international since 2005, Godín has appeared for the country at two World Cups and as many Copa América tournaments.
comment: Diego Roberto Godín Leal (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈdjeɣo ɣoˈðin]; born 16 February 1986) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays for Atlético Madrid in La Liga, as a central defender.He has spent most of his professional career in Spain, representing Villarreal and Atlético Madrid and winning four major titles with the latter.A Uruguayan international since 2005, Godín has appeared for the country at two World Cups and as many Copa América tournaments.
